title: To the Land of the Wize
report: The White Horse man..... thats what I found.... and I road it through the fields of poppies.
And upon a dream I floated away, my thoughts fading to gray.
To the Land of Nod thus I sway, forever more my thoughts there lay.

erowid.citation: DemonXstreeM. "To the Land of the Wize: experience with Heroin (ID 67076)". Erowid.org. Jan 1, 2008. erowid.org/exp/67076
